General.Name: Isbir Sentetik Dokuma Sanayi AS
General.Description: Isbir Sentetik Dokuma Sanayi A.S. operates in industrial packaging and technical textile sectors in Turkey, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company offers big bags, carpet base, artificial grass carpet, big bag fabrics, shrink and stretch hoods, PE fabrics, compound fillers, additive masterbatches, and masks. It engages in the trade, import, and export of polypropylene and polyethylene raw materials. The company's products are used in mining, chemical, food, and pharmaceutical industries. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Balikesir, Turkey.
